item.title: The Beauty of Namaqualand
item.description: When Gautengers try to escape the hustle and bustle of the big city, they come to Garies to wind down and enjoy nature. Wim and Hariette Hofsink is like family and they visit us annually for the flower extravaganza. Here is just some of the scenes they enjoyed in their time here.
item.content:encoded:
Part of our De Kleine Werf Family

When Gautengers try to escape the hustle and bustle of the big city, they come to Garies to wind down and enjoy nature. Wim and Hariette Hofsink is like family and they visit us annually for the flower extravaganza. Here is just some of the scenes they enjoyed in their time here.

item.title: We welcome back some of our regulars
item.description: Our annual nature lovers visitors. We are their preferred accommodation in Garies and it is always lovely to welcome them back each year.
item.content:encoded:
These nature lovers on their yearly trip to us

This time of year, nature lovers from all over come to Garies and stay with us. As always, it is nice to see the McAlpines. These nature lovers have been coming here for years. Even the sticker on the back "Ons Kyk Blomme, Gaan Verby" says it all. This is dedication. We will keep your room ready for next year.Â

item.title: Spring is in the air
item.description: The fauna and the flora is in full swing. For people suffering from hay-fever, this is an absolute nightmare, but for nature lovers this is heaven. This display of natural beauty only happens once a year in Garies and surrounding areas and don't last that long. We appreciate it while we can.
item.content:encoded:
Flowers in Namaqualand

The fauna and the flora is in full swing. For people suffering from hay-fever, this is an absolute nightmare, but for nature lovers this is heaven. This display of natural beauty only happens once a year in Garies and surrounding areas and don't last that long. We appreciate it while we can.
